front.title: QUIC Encapsulation for Media over RTP - Requirements and Use Cases

abstract.t: This document describes the uses cases, requirements, and considerations that should guide the design of the encapsulation of a real-time media transport protocol as a payload in the QUIC protocol. Note to Readers _RFC Editor: please remove this section before publication_ Source code and issues for this draft can be found at https://github.com/fiestajetsam/draft-gruessing-moq-requirements (https://github.com/fiestajetsam/draft-gruessing-moq-requirements).
